name: Catnip Quest
description:
Ah... you’re here, good. We have a problem, a big one. Our planet’s catnip supply is rapidly dwindling, and despite the lab’s attempts to find a solution through DNA research, they have been unsuccessful. We are quickly running out of catnip and without it, our feline population will be in peril. That’s why I believe you are our only chance. You must go back to your roots and find a source of rooted catnip.

I’ve marked your map with the location of the nearest earth. Best of luck to you, as you’ll surely need it.

(Known bug: game controller is not working at the moment)

This game is part of Global Game Jam 2023. We created all of this in 48 hours!

Credit:

Game design - Lorena Weder, Anna Dohy

Code - Lorena Weder, Anna Dohy

3D art - Robin Van Lierop, Anna Dohy
